nodes.text: The Red Hand Cluster was a location near which a fleet commanded by Moff Royen of the Galactic Empire became cut off from support in the aftermath of the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY. Around that time Caern Adan, an agent in the New Republic's Intelligence branch, mentioned the situation of Royan's fleet near the cluster during an address to General Hera Syndulla and the New Republic's Alphabet Squadron.
The Red Hand Cluster was mentioned in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, written by Alexander Freed.
